info.name: FLanders-bender
info.description:
# Flight Landers Back End Server
**Bender** is the back end server for FLanders, a flight search engine set up during our bootcamp on MERN @ Hack A Boss. A Coru√±a 2020-2021.

## Estructure
- **Public**:
Login and search engine.
- **Authorized**:
Update profile and book flights.

item.name: Public

request.description:
# Landing page.
This route leads to the landing page where sits the search form.
You may do searchs without being authorized.

response.body:
Flight Landers

LO & behold

  • Home
  • Login
  • Sign In

request.description:
# Error 404 Not found
Any invalid url will lead to this route.

# About.
This route redirects to the app info page. Here you can find info about the App, authors, motivation, license, etc...

# Register User
This is the register form for new users.
You can make searchs without being authorized, but you must log in if you want to make a booking.

response.name: /signin
response.body:
Flight Landers

Sign in

  • Home
  • Login
  • Sign In

request.description:
# Log in form
This leads to the form to log in the system. Once authorized you can update your profile info and make bookings aswell.

response.name: /login
response.body:
Flight Landers

Login

  • Home
  • Login
  • Sign In

Or Login with your google account

request.description:
# Register Random User
This will register a new random user in the system.
Will also send a mail to the user mail.
In this case we are using a free public inbox:
randomUserName@mailinator.com
You can check it out or try with your own mail.

Mail is unique ID in the system.

If you run this routes in order with a test script this route post test script will store the registered mail as env variable.
this variable is used in the route login aswell.


Once a mail is deleted it can never be use again in that DB.

# POST Login
This route will log an user in the sistem and receive a token as well.
In this case it will use the last user stored on env.

This will store the token on the postman env.

# Make a Flight Search
This route answers the question "What one way Flights are there from X to Y in that date por Z persons?"

response.name: /search/flight (Solo Ida)

request.description:
# Make a Flight Search
This route answers the question "What one way Flights are there from X to Y in that date por Z persons?"

response.name: /search/flight (Solo Ida)

request.description: verifies token

item.description:
## Anybody can access this route.
### GET
- **/** - Leads to the Flight Search Page

- **/anyInvalidURL** - Any invalid url will redirect to the error response.

- **/about** - Navigates to the info app page.

- **/signin** - Navigates to the register user page.

- **/login** - Navigates to the user login page.

### POST
- **/signin** - Registers a new user in te system.

- **/login** - Grants access to the system for the user.

- **/search/flight** - Makes the question for a flight search.

response.name: update profile

request.description:
# Avatar upload.
This stores a new avatar picture on the system.

Note_ if automated file is not provided, please add your own picture here.

# DELETE?
Due to data consistency we cant currently delete the user, instead we make unavaible FOREVER.
That mail can never be used again in the system and user will be redirected to the login page.

item.description: ## Must be logged and authorized to use this routes.
